description: Explore the captivating beauty of Frontenac Provincial Park, a sprawling 5355-hectare backcountry sanctuary located just 45 minutes north of Kingston. This natural gem is open year-round and boasts an extensive network of over 100 kilometers of interconnected hiking trails, interior camping opportunities, and an array of paddle routes meandering through the rugged Canadian Shield landscape.
name: Frontenac Park Map 6th Edition
